SENT.plain: Moyamoya disease is generally recognized in young children
One potential treatment is direct extra-intracranial bypass combined with indirect revascularization using encephalo-myo-synangiosis
Standard follow-up to assess neoangiogenesis includes repeat cerebral angiography, which is invasive
The authors studied whether noninvasive power Doppler imaging could evaluate the patency of the bypass and the degree of indirect revascularization
They found that transcranial power Doppler imaging is a valid noninvasive alternative to cerebral angiography
